short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows most recent balance and value. Average token price of cryptocompare is used for conversion to EUR, USD, ETH and BTC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows the most recent balance and value of a wallet. Average token price of cryptocompare is used for conversion to EUR, USD, ETH and BTC.

Intended to quickly check a wallet balance of DUSK.
